Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

being a fan of those vicious movie and game corporations (Umbrella, Aspari, OCP, Cyberdyne, ...) I thought it would be nice to have their logos as flags/decals for our fictious companies and crafts.

Since sharing is caring, I make them available for you as well.

Oh right, the very most of them (all but two I think) have a transparent background, which looks better most of the time than just some white or black background blotch in my opinion.

Cause no pics no clicks:

Note though, I neither hold copyrights to these, nor do I want to nor bla bla...

Just enjoy!

DOWNLOAD

Edited May 22, 2015 by Sunshine
Update 1
Simply because I want to build an Umbrella corporation galactic Empire

Aperture Aerospace Administration

Could you add Omnicorp, Black Mesa, or UNSC?

Edited July 19, 2014 by dbmorpher
Nice logos. I too would suggest a Black Mesa logo in a future update.
How about Crynet and CELL from crysis?

Wayland and Yutani and Wayland Yutani.

Edit: nevermind then what about Wayland and Yutani seperate?
I didn't expect anyone to download this, since there were some requests, I tried to fulfill them as good as possible and added some more corporations while I was at it...
i know this is quite old but im curious would this still work?

*waking up*

Wha... what!?

Oh...

Uh.

Sure!

No really, it should still work like a charm. Regarding flags, nothing was changed.

Let me know if you do encounter problems though.

*waking up*

Wha... what!?

Oh...

Uh.

Sure!

No really, it should still work like a charm. Regarding flags, nothing was changed.

Let me know if you do encounter problems though.

I put the main folder into my game data folder just like in the instructions and its not working still, am i missing something
You know, there are three more Aperture logos you could fit in there...

I put the main folder into my game data folder just like in the instructions and its not working still, am i missing something

Nah, kinda my fault.

For whatever reason I forgot to create the main mod folder so you have to do it yourself, like "CorporationFlags" and in that one you put the flags folder - then it works, just tested it myself.

For clarity: KSP/GameData/CorporationFlags

Also, I just updated the file and replaced the download link.

Can you add the EDF from Red Faction: Guerilla?

Also the Rio Grande Coal Co. from TF2?

Edited May 23, 2015 by SpacePi

I'm not really working on this at the moment.

If I'll update it in the future, I'll add it.
Hey Sunshine! I love this flag pack! Any chance of you adding any more flags to it?
